review: This game has bicycles 10/10 must eat, best doritoz

if you loved the previous fallout games, you will love this game, i'll admit that this game isn't for everyone, for example it's basically fallout but with improved mechanics and ingame engine, so if you disliked previous fallout games or haven't played any of the other fallouts before, chances are this game might not be for you
